title: Alex Jones Fined 1 Billion Dollars?? With Jack Posobiec
itunes:title: Alex Jones Fined 1 Billion Dollars?? With Jack Posobiec
description:
It’s a huge news day on The Charlie Kirk Show, with Alex Jones ordered to pay nearly a billion dollars, and the Saudis sticking it to sleepy Joe, and Charlie covers all of it. He starts off with the shocking punishment that does not fit the crime for Alex Jones, explaining why you can disagree with what Jones said and still find this punishment abhorrent. Then, host of TPUSA’s Human Events Daily, Jack Posobiec, joins the show to explain Biden’s corrupt, quid pro quo request to Saudi Arabia.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
